Address: 10 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Perfect Starter In Convenient Coastal Location
Positioned in the established and highly sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs is this much-loved home which is primed to start a new chapter – enticing investment opportunity, renovators delight or ideal first home buyer.
Newly carpeted throughout and comprising of three bedrooms, two with built in robes, generous size living area with split system heating and cooling that flows through to the functional kitchen and dining space. A glass sliding door off the dining area leads out onto the undercover decked entertaining area; perfect for social gatherings with family or friends.
Outdoor features a garden shed and single carport, low maintenance gardens and plenty of space for the family to enjoy. The backyard offers easy access onto Clifton Springs Golf Course, which is sure to impress the keen golfer!
Located within walking distance to the beach, local shops and public transport, this home offers affordability in a great central location! The only thing that is missing is your vision and imagination!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Great Corner Position
Clifton Springs continues to deliver great prospects for those looking to break into the housing market. This established three bedroom home in need of modernising with access for the boat or caravan, single car garage with remote plus garden shedding all add up to a great entry property for the first home buyer or investor. Solid and cosy, a lick of paint and new carpets or floorboards would immediately transform this little gem.
The kitchen and dining area are complimented by an outdoor area that faces north and is a perfect suntrap on those sunny winter days. Bedrooms have ceiling fans and there is air conditioning to the living area. Gas space heating and modern gas HWS. 581m2
For those ready to take the plunge into the vibrant real estate market this property is a must to inspect quickly !

Description:
Right out of Better Homes & Gardens - Its all been done.
Here is an opportunity to buy into the flourishing Clifton Springs home marked with a fully
renovated home at 1 Dederang Avenue.
After you pass by the gorgeous front garden you are straight into an absolutely immaculately presented home, you could move into straight away.
A spacious lounge area greets you that has been stylishly renovated to give a sense of quality. The kitchen has also been renovated with stainless steel appliances and new benchtops with plenty of natural light. Three spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes gives a high quality feel to the home. The ensuite and bathroom, also renovated, continue the attention to detail the owner has undertaken.
A private impressive alfresco area is off the house and leads to a well maintained backyard and a double car garage.
If you are looking for the opportunity to buy a property that is in immaculate condition, or an investment property without the hassle of renovations or simply wanting to make the sea change to the Bellarine Peninsula, 1 Dederang Ave is well worth an inspection.

Description:
Brand New Home with Stunning Bay Views
This brand new 4 bedroom split level house offers stunning bay views to the You Yangs and lights of Geelong.
Huge open plan lounge, dining, kitchen area opens on to the covered west facing decking. Well-appointed kitchen with gas and electric cooking, spacious work bench, corner pantry, and dishwasher. Study nook and powder room. Main bedroom with walk-in robe and full ensuite. Downstairs are 2 extra bedrooms, central bathroom, plus the family/rumpus room that leads to the rear yard. Ducted gas heating and reverse cycle air conditioning throughout. Double garage with remote door and rear access. Complete with carpets, blinds, down lights, and landscaped gardens. Ready to move in NOW.

Description:
Split level and full of light
The light-filled free-flowing design of this bayside home will appeal to all markets in particular first home buyers. Set between two reserves, on a no through road, the location is quiet and appealing. Boasting 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 spacious living zones, a sunny undercover deck and roomy backyard, this home has all a young family needs and more!
The newly renovated kitchen is at the heart of the home. Set beneath a vaulted lantern-style ceiling, benchtops and quality appliances are bathed in natural light. Appliances include Smeg double oven, Electrolux induction cooktop and LG dishwasher. The walk-in pantry and spacious cabinetry provide excellent storage.
Both living zones access the entertaining deck with views over the backyard to the lush reserve beyond. These north-facing spaces are delightful all year round. The main living hub flows seamlessly to the dining area and study, and boasts ducted gas heating, a gas heater and split system AC. The split level design and vaulted ceilings deliver great ambiance.
The master BR is ideal, with characterful ensuite featuring double shower over bath, vanity and toilet. All bedrooms feature built-in robes and ceiling fans. The main bathroom is huge, and offers twin vanity, shower over bath and toilet.
The backyard is a secure haven for children and pets. Single carport and garden shed.
Near bay beaches and a golf course. Drysdale primary school is within walking distance. Minutes to Drysdale village. 30 minutes to Geelong.
Enjoy an inspection at this timeless, comfortable home.
Insights: 35 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 21 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
"Paris End" Of Town
Located only 300 meters from Clifton Springs famous north facing Edgewater with access to swim beaches and 'the dell', this is a rare opportunity to secure property a brilliant property in a prime location. With ample off street parking for cars, boats and caravans, alfresco entertaining with views across the bay to Geelong's night lights and Corio Bay water traffic, this 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is perfect for those looking to slow down and enjoy the Bellarine. Comprising master with full ensuite, 2 further bedrooms with central bathroom, family room flowing onto the outdoor entertaining area, central kitchen with quality appliances, formal lounge with bay views and dining area or study. Garaging, carport, off street parking and position to the waterfront are key aspects of the immaculate home positioned at the Paris End of Beacon Point Road!

Description:
Stylish Townhouse
On its own title and sure to impress is this immaculate townhouse. Located on an elevated corner allotment the home offers a quality finish and low maintenance lifestyle.
The open light filled living, meals & kitchen area features split system air conditioner & leads to the inviting outdoor alfresco deck.
Polished floating timber floors in the lounge & tiled dining alcove.
Comprising three bedrooms, master with walk in robe & ensuite.
The low maintenance garden includes elevated garden beds, double garage with internal entry and solar hot water, all of this situated on a convenient 395m²(approx) parcel of land.
This neat little package allows you to simply lock and leave - there is nothing more to do but move in and enjoy!

Description:
WARMTH, CHARACTER & 700M+ BLOCK OF LAND!
If you desire a property that oozes charm, warmth and character than look no further!!
Upon inspection you will be greeted by a lovely picket fence, established gardens and a feeling of 'wide open spaces' with the home being set deep on the overly generous parcel of land (723m2 approx).
Big beautiful federation windows provide an abundance of natural light and perfectly frame various private garden settings. Exposed internal brick, timber look floors, log fire and splashes of slate flooring beautifully compliment what is a truly charming 'home'.
This property boasts 2 exceptional living areas; an open plan kitchen/family/meals is room enough for the whole family and an additional living zone is bathed in natural light; glass sliding doors step out onto a beautifully private courtyard. 3 generous bedrooms (all with built in robes) provide further spacious living zones.
If you require secure car accommodation for multiple cars, caravan, boat and the jet ski you will be impressed by the user friendly nature of this generous allotment; a double carport and a host of other off street options present. An undercover outdoor entertaining area and colour bond shed (6m x 3.5m) ensure this property ticks all the boxes.
Complete with all the modern comforts; including ducted heating, air conditioning and solar panels make this property a 'must see'!
A second to none location; a local shopping strip including a general store & bulk bill GP are literally around the corner, the golf course is within walking distance and the well regarded Clifton Springs Boat Ramp is within a few hundred metres down the road.
Insights: 54 Mirrabooka Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT- HAYESWINCKLE DRYSDALE
This solid brick homes offers potential in a multitude of ways! For the savvy investor the home is well looked after by long term tenants that have resided at the property for the past 2 years, the tenants are keen to extend their lease and are paying $310 p/w. For all first home buyers now is your opportunity to TAKE ADVANTAGE This home is brick, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and set upon 585m2 and the only one currently in the listed price range. What a fantastic entry point into the market and a future investment to grow the portfolio.
This home is appealing because it has great foundations and room to improve and make it your own if desired. The free flowing floor plan offers an open plan kitchen, dining and living area with a zoned master bedroom at the fore of the home including walk-in robe and ensuite. The remaining 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes are neatly located at the rear of the home complete with a main bathroom including bath and shower.
The property offers an oversized single carport plus plenty of additional on premise car spaces. You will come to a neat sitting area before entering the back garden where you will find an abundance of space to create an amazing garden filled with fruit trees and vegetable patches or enjoy the grassed area as it is.
Features of the property include, wall heater in the living room, electric cooking appliances, 2 toilets and garden shed.
With the Clifton Springs boat ramp located virtually at the end of the street you are close to the bay, local shops, schools and transport. Clifton Springs is up and coming and a huge growth corridor as we know it, this is one not to be missed!!

Description:
Renovators and developers here is an opportunity
Situated on a corner allotment, 3-5 Kiama Way presents itself as having unlimited opportunity for the astute buyer. This vast and versatile property, totalling 1469sqm (approx.), offers renovators and developers some very exciting options considering the property has already been approved for a 3 allotment subdivision. Upon entry, you are greeted with a 3 bedroom solid brick home that has plenty of potential to be brought back to its former glory. A spacious lounge area with an open fireplace brings charm to the home which is a rare feature in today’s modern homes. The kitchen has also renovated with stainless steel appliances and benchtops with plenty of natural light present. A partial renovation has been completed to the bathroom while the ensuite is in good condition. If you are looking for the opportunity to buy a property that has unlimited potential as a renovation project or the scope to develop a unit development and located within a short drive to some of the best wineries, restaurants and fresh food that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. An inspection at the property is a must to fully appreciate what the property has to offer.
Insights: 3-5 Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Living on 1181m2
This established 3 bedroom brick home on 1181m2 block has a massive rumpus room extension and 2 double garages. L-shaped lounge and dining area, updated kitchen with gas and electric appliances, central bathroom with large corner spa. Gas log fire and built-in bar. Double brick garage plus a double steel garage with separate side access. Ideal for boats, trailers, and caravans. Adjoins central reserve, playground, and pre-school centre.

Description:
STYLISH VILLA, AS NEW WITH A BAY ASPECT!
Beautifully finished designer townhouse with a touch of class. Open plan living with loads of natural light combined with leafy aspect and bay view, two double bedrooms, both with BIR'S, 2 way central bathroom, laundry and direct access to inside from garage. Features include solar panels, central heating, split system, pantry, dishwasher and quality fittings. Investors looking to get into the market, great first home buy or those looking to downsize. Schools, shops, parklands all nearby with the Marina and Dell just around the corner. This stylish development is ready for you to settle in and enjoy the beauty of the Bellarine Penisula.

Description:
Family Haven!
Set on a generous 636 sqm, this beachside family home has been cleverly enhanced to maximise comfort and privacy. Two lower-floor bedrooms contain built-in-robes, while the master with ensuite, parents' retreat and direct balcony access occupies the whole first floor. A timber kitchen with ample cupboard space, dishwasher and breakfast bar overlooks two open-plan living areas which are serviced by a second bathroom with separate shower and bath. Additional benefits include floorboards, slate tiles, downlights, central heating and split cycle cooling. A double carport provides access to a large secure yard with garden shed and swing set. Within walking distance of the waterfront and close to schools, shops, public transport and Clifton Springs Golf Course, this home is move-in ready!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 85 Jetty Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Clifton Springs Position
This is one of Clifton Springs best established estates due to its proximity to the waterfront precinct, new beautified walkways and The Dell without having to pay top dollar. Access to schools, convenience shops and public transport are practically at the door step of the renovated delight, perfect for the investor looking to enter the Bellarine Peninsula market with a booming demand for rentals and high growth potential. Newly painted, new carpets & renovated bathroom, this 3 bedroom home has solar electricity, large rain water tank, a central lounge, kitchen dining area and enjoys a fantastic 668 square meter block of land. Priced to sell, this is a perfect property to add to the investment portfolio.

Description:
Large Allotment!
Situated in a quiet court location and backing onto a natural reserve is this generously proportioned parcel of land measuring 608m2. With larger allotments becoming a thing of the past the opportunity to purchase this block in a established area is too good to pass up. Live on the Bellarine Peninsula and enjoy the wonderful lifestyle it offers whilst commuting to work on the Portarlington Ferry- sounds great doesn't it? The boat ramp is a few minutes drive away for the fishermen whilst shopping amenities are also within a short drive. There are numerous sheds on the land which will be removed unless negotiated to stay with purchaser. Look to the future and buy today. You'll be glad you did! Call for more details.
